author: Special Correspondent
text:
Since the Model Code of Conduct came into force in the State, cash and items to the tune of Rs. 16.30 crore have been seized and a total of 1,857 cases registered across the State for violating the poll code, an official release said.

Of the 1.93 lakh complaints received on damage to public property till March 30, over 1.82 lakh wall advertisements have been removed. As regards over 76,500 complaints of damage to private property, over 68,600 have been cleared.
title: Over 1,800 cases registered
